songs.title: Sugar Plum Fairy Introlude (a cappella)
songs.lyrics:
[Interlude]
Ah-ho, ah-ho, ah-ho, ah-ho
Ahh (Ahh), ahh (Ahh), ahh (Ahh)
Ahh (Ahh), ahh (Ahh), ahh (Ahh)
Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah (Mm-mm-mm-mm-mm)

Ah-ah-ah, ah-ah-ah
Ah-ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah-ah (Mm-mm-mm-mm-mm)
Ahh-ahh-ahh, ahh-ahh-ahh (La-la-la, ahh-ahh-ahh)
Ahh-ahh-ahh, ahh-ahh-ahh
Ahh-ahh-ahh, ahh-ahh-ahh-ahh-ahh (Mm-mm-mm-mm-mm)
Ohh-ohh-ohh  (Mm-mm-mm-mm-mm)
La-da-da, la (Mm-mm-mm-mm-mm)
La-da-da, la (Mm-mm-mm)
Ahh-ahh-ahh, ohh, ahh
